seniority_level.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Data Engineer' with 5-8+ years experience required, aligning with senior level in data engineering hierarchy

job_family.evidence: Job title is 'Data Engineer' and responsibilities focus on building data pipelines, Spark, and cloud platforms

sub_specialty.evidence: Explicit mention of 'Experience in developing streaming pipelines' and Kafka as a required skill

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of people management, team leadership, or architectural oversight; focus is on individual technical execution

primary_cloud.evidence: Explicitly mentioned in title and responsibilities: 'AWS Cloud Data Platform', 'AWS EMR', 'AWS Glue', 'AWS RedShift'

secondary_clouds.evidence: No other cloud platforms (Azure, GCP) mentioned in skills or responsibilities

processing_paradigm.evidence: Mentions both 'streaming pipelines' (Kafka) and batch processing via Spark on Hadoop/AWS, indicating hybrid workload handling

orchestrator_category.evidence: AWS Glue and EMR are cloud-native orchestration tools; no mention of Airflow, Dagster, or dbt

storage_layer.evidence: Mentions HDFS (lake), AWS S3 (lake), and AWS RedShift (warehouse), indicating mixed storage architecture

remote_restriction.evidence: Location specified as 'Pune, Maharashtra, India' with onsite work model, implying regional restriction

timezone_focus.evidence: Location restricted to India (IN) with no mention of global or multi-timezone teams

relocation_required.evidence: Onsite work model in Pune, India implies candidate must relocate or already be based there

h1b_friendly.evidence: No mention of visa sponsorship; location is India, not US, making H1B irrelevant

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: Location in India and no mention of student visa support; OPT/CPT are US-specific

citizenship_required.evidence: Location in India implies local work authorization required; no citizenship restrictions mentioned

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time permanent position at IBM, a large corporation, strongly implies W2 employment

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits listed in extraction; no mention of equity, PTO, learning budget, or conferences

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No explicit career tracks mentioned; only general 'growth opportunities' implied by IBM's scale

mentorship_signals.evidence: Working in IBM Consulting Client Innovation Centers suggests collaboration with experienced teams, but no formal mentorship program mentioned

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No explicit mention of promotions, advancement, or career progression paths

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, lateral moves, or exploring other roles within IBM

career_tracks_available.evidence: No specific career tracks (IC, management, architect) mentioned in job description

requirement_strictness.evidence: All skills listed are 'must have' with no 'nice to have' items; strict experience requirements (5-8+ years)

scope_definition.evidence: Focused on data engineering with specific technologies (Spark, AWS, Kafka) and responsibilities (pipelines, ingestion, transformation)

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Skills required (Spark, AWS, Kafka, SQL) are reasonable for a senior data engineer with 5-8 years experience
